questions.question: How to create a new account?
questions.answer: You can create an account by clicking the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner. Fill in your personal information and valid email, then check your email to verify your account.

questions.question: I forgot my password, how to recover it?
questions.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email. We will send a password reset link to your email.

questions.question: How to enroll in a course?
questions.answer: Browse the course list, select the course you want and click 'Enroll'. You can preview some free lessons before deciding.

questions.question: Can I access courses on mobile?
questions.answer: Yes! Our platform works smoothly on all devices including smartphones and tablets.

questions.question: What payment methods are supported?
questions.answer: We support payments via credit cards, debit cards, e-wallets and bank transfers.

questions.question: How to receive certificates?
questions.answer: After completing the course and passing the tests, you will receive a downloadable digital certificate.

questions.question: Website won't load, what should I do?
questions.answer: Try refreshing the page, clearing browser cache, or try a different browser. If the problem persists, please contact us.

questions.question: Lesson videos won't play?
questions.answer: Check your internet connection, make sure your browser supports HTML5, and try reloading the page. If still having issues, contact technical support.
